location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 5586/43 Lord Wavell: request for pearls from Bahrain

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 6; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence regarding an upcoming visit to Bahrain by the newly appointed Governor-General of India Archibald Wavell, 1 Earl Wavell, and his request to view a selection of pearls. The correspondents are the India Office and the Political Resident, Persian Gulf.
